name: Environics Trust
briefDescription: Environics Trust is a not-for-profit research and community development organisation and an enabling Institution. Environics conducts participatory research on issues of environment and human behavior and uses these outcomes for innovative community development programmes. The four practices through which we provide our inputs are:1.	Participatory Research2.	Community Based Action3.	Enterprise Development and Servicing and4.	Communication.Environics anchors several networks and partnerships.
